alert.note: Alert for Douglas; Haralson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 12:20PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Haralson, central Carroll and southwestern Douglas Counties through 1245 PM EDT... At 1220 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near I 20 Welcome Center to near Hannah, and moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Carrollton, Bowdon, Mount Zion, Clem, Abilene, John Tanner State Park, Treasure Lake, Bowdon Junction, Hannah, Seaton Lake and Fairplay. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
